header.title: Advanced BBCode Box 3 (aka ABBC3) Add-on : Compact View.
header.description:
This file provides instructions to switch ABBC3 from it's default icon-based toolbar to ABBC3's Compact View. All ABBC3 BBcodes will be moved in to a neat drop-down menu for a much cleaner and compact appearance in the post editor. ABBC3's icons are still shown next to each BBcode in the menu, and BBcode helpful hints will be displayed in a compact tooltip when the mouse hovers over a BBcode.
See the main install file for any additional information about the MOD.
header.author-notes:
To read more about ABBC3, please read the contrib/docs/README.HTML file
------------------------------------------------------------------- NOTE: This addition is optional
To see example screenshots : root/contrib/screenshots/Prosilver_posting_default.gif against root/contrib/screenshots/Prosilver_posting_compactview.gif or root/contrib/screenshots/Subsilver2_posting_default.gif against root/contrib/screenshots/Subsilver2_posting_compactview.gif
------------------------------------------------------------------- Also you can may find useful the "User Control Panel" add-on which will allow you to give your users the option to decide if they want to see ABBC3 Compact or ABBC3 default in their UCP Board Preferences.
Please read the contrib/add-on_MSSTI_ABBC3_User_Control_Panel.xml
